trans-unit.source: <arg><param><value> an argument, parameter, value, etc... that must be provided to a command
trans-unit.target: <arg> <param> <value> 必须提供给命令的参数，参数，值等

trans-unit.source: -d, --database show database version
trans-unit.target: -d, --database 显示数据库版本

trans-unit.source: -h, --help show help message
trans-unit.target: -h, --help help显示帮助消息

trans-unit.source: -v, --version show program version
trans-unit.target: -v, --version version显示程序版本

trans-unit.source: AUTHOR the username of the author (uploader) in full format
trans-unit.target: AUTHOR 的用户名（上传者）的完整格式

trans-unit.source: CONTENT content in html format
trans-unit.target: CONTENT 中的HTML格式的内容

trans-unit.source: COOKIES cookies for the scraper, stored in JSON format
trans-unit.target: COOKIES 刮板的 Cookie，以JSON格式存储

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION description in html format
trans-unit.target: DESCRIPTION 在HTML格式描述

trans-unit.source: EXTRAS field in USERS table is changed to MENTIONS, and extras and Extras folders are renamed to mentions and mentions_all respectively.
trans-unit.target: EXTRAS USERS 表中的EXTRAS字段已更改为 MENTIONS ，并且 extras 和 Extras 文件夹分别重命名为 mentions 和 mentions_all 。

trans-unit.source: FILEEXT the extensions of the downloaded file. Can be empty if the file contained errors and could not be recognised upon download
trans-unit.target: FILEEXT 下载文件的扩展名。如果文件包含错误并且在下载时无法识别，则可以为空

trans-unit.source: FILELINK the remote URL of the submission file
trans-unit.target: FILELINK 提交文件的远程URL

trans-unit.source: FILESAVED 1 if the file was successfully downloaded and saved, 0 if there was an error during download
trans-unit.target: FILESAVED 如果文件已成功下载并保存，则为1；如果下载过程中存在错误，则为0

trans-unit.source: FILESFOLDER location of downloaded submission files
trans-unit.target: FILESFOLDER 下载提交文件的FILESFOLDER位置

trans-unit.source: FOLDERS the folders downloaded for that specific user.
trans-unit.target: FOLDERS 下载了特定用户的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: ID the id of the journal
trans-unit.target: ID 日记的ID

trans-unit.source: ID the id of the submission
trans-unit.target: ID 提交的ID

trans-unit.source: LASTSTART time when the program was last started (UNIX time in seconds)
trans-unit.target: LASTSTART 上次启动程序的LASTSTART时间（UNIX时间，以秒为单位）

trans-unit.source: LASTUPDATE time when the last update was completed (UNIX time in seconds)
trans-unit.target: LASTUPDATE 上次更新完成时的LASTUPDATE时间（以秒为单位的UNIX时间）

trans-unit.source: MENTIONS this is a legacy entry used by the program up to version 2.11.2 (was named EXTRAS)
trans-unit.target: MENTIONS 这是程序在2.11.2之前的版本中使用的旧条目（被称为 EXTRAS ）

trans-unit.source: SUBN number of submissions in the SUBMISSIONS table
trans-unit.target: SUBN SUBMISSIONS 表中的SUBN提交数

trans-unit.source: TAGS keywords sorted alphanumerically and comma-separated
trans-unit.target: TAGS 关键字按字母数字排序并以逗号分隔

trans-unit.source: UDATE upload date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
trans-unit.target: UDATE 上传日期，格式为YYYY-MM-DD

trans-unit.source: USERNAME The URL username of the user (no underscores or spaces)
trans-unit.target: USERNAME 用户的URL用户名（无下划线或空格）

trans-unit.source: USRN number of users in the USERS table
trans-unit.target: USRN USERS 表中的USRN用户数

trans-unit.source: VERSION database version, this can differ from the program version
trans-unit.target: VERSION 数据库版本，可能与程序版本不同

trans-unit.source: [<optional>] an optional argument that can be omitted
trans-unit.target: [<optional>] 可以省略的可选参数

trans-unit.source: add-journal <param1>=<value1> ... <paramN>=<valueN> add a journal to the database manually. The following parameters are necessary for a journal entry to be accepted:
trans-unit.target: add-journal <param1>=<value1> ... <paramN>=<valueN> 手动将日记添加到数据库。要接受日记帐分录，必须使用以下参数：

trans-unit.source: add-submission <param1>=<value1> ... <paramN>=<valueN> add a submission to the database manually. The submission file is not downloaded and can instead be provided with the extra parameter file_local_url. The following parameters are necessary for a submission entry to be accepted:
trans-unit.target: add-submission <param1>=<value1> ... <paramN>=<valueN> 手动将提交添加到数据库。提交文件未下载，而是可以使用额外的参数 file_local_url 来提供。要接受提交条目，必须使用以下参数：

trans-unit.source: author author
trans-unit.target: author 撰文

trans-unit.source: check-errors check the database for common errors and prints a list of entries that contain erroneous data. Requires no arguments.
trans-unit.target: check-errors 检查数据库中的常见错误，并打印包含错误数据的条目列表。不需要参数。

trans-unit.source: clean clean the database using the SQLite VACUUM function. Requires no arguments.
trans-unit.target: clean 整洁使用SQLite的数据库真空功能。不需要参数。

trans-unit.source: command a static command keyword
trans-unit.target: command 一个静态命令关键字

trans-unit.source: config manage settings
trans-unit.target: config 管理设置

trans-unit.source: content the body of the journal
trans-unit.target: content 期刊正文

trans-unit.source: cookies [<cookie a>] [<cookie b>] the cookies stored in the database.
trans-unit.target: cookies [<cookie a>] [<cookie b>] 存储在数据库中的cookie。

trans-unit.source: database operate on the database
trans-unit.target: database 对数据库进行操作

trans-unit.source: date date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
trans-unit.target: date 日期，格式为YYYY-MM-DD

trans-unit.source: download perform downloads
trans-unit.target: download 执行下载

trans-unit.source: file_local_url if provided, take the submission file from this path and put it into the database
trans-unit.target: file_local_url 如果提供了file_local_url，请从此路径获取提交文件并将其放入数据库中

trans-unit.source: file_url the url of the submission file, not used to download the file
trans-unit.target: file_url 提交文件的URL，不用于下载文件

trans-unit.source: files-folder [<new folder>] the folder used to store submission files. This can be any path relative to the folder of the database. If a new value is given, the program will move any files to the new location.
trans-unit.target: files-folder [<new folder>] 用于存储提交文件的文件夹。这可以是相对于数据库文件夹的任何路径。如果给出新值，程序将把所有文件移到新位置。

trans-unit.source: help display the manual of a command
trans-unit.target: help 显示命令手册

trans-unit.source: id journal id
trans-unit.target: id 日记ID

trans-unit.source: id submission id
trans-unit.target: id 提交ID

trans-unit.source: init create the database and exit
trans-unit.target: init 创建数据库并退出

trans-unit.source: journals <id1> ... [<idN>] download specific journals. Requires journal ID's provided as separate arguments.
trans-unit.target: journals <id1> ... [<idN>] 下载特定的日志。要求提供日记ID作为单独的参数。

trans-unit.source: remove-journals <id1> ... [<idN>] remove specific journals from the database.
trans-unit.target: remove-journals <id1> ... [<idN>] 从数据库中删除特定的日志。

trans-unit.source: remove-submissions <id1> ... [<idN>] remove specific submissions from the database.
trans-unit.target: remove-submissions <id1> ... [<idN>] 从数据库中删除特定的提交。

trans-unit.source: remove-users <user1> ... [<userN>] remove specific users from the database.
trans-unit.target: remove-users <user1> ... [<userN>] 用户N>]从数据库中删除特定用户。

trans-unit.source: search-journals <param1>=<value1> ... [<paramN>=<valueN>] search the journals entries using metadata fields. Search is conducted case-insensitively using the SQLite like expression. Search parameters can be passed multiple times to act as OR values. The following search parameters are supported:
trans-unit.target: search-journals <param1>=<value1> ... [<paramN>=<valueN>] 使用元数据字段搜索日记帐分录。使用 like SQLite的表达式不区分大小写地进行搜索。搜索参数可以多次传递以用作OR值。支持以下搜索参数：

trans-unit.source: search-submissions <param1>=<value1> ... [<paramN>=<valueN>] search the submissions entries using metadata fields. Search is conducted case-insensitively using the SQLite like expression which allows for limited pattern matching. For example this string can be used to search two tags together separated by an unknown amount of characters cat,%mouse. Search parameters can be passed multiple times to act as OR values. The following search parameters are supported:
trans-unit.target: search-submissions <param1>=<value1> ... [<paramN>=<valueN>] 使用元数据字段搜索提交条目。使用 like SQLite的表达式不区分大小写地进行搜索，该表达式允许有限的模式匹配。例如，该字符串可用于搜索两个标签，两个标签之间用数量未知的 cat,%mouse 隔开。搜索参数可以多次传递以用作OR值。支持以下搜索参数：

trans-unit.source: submissions <id1> ... [<idN>] download specific submissions. Requires submission ID's provided as separate arguments.
trans-unit.target: submissions <id1> ... [<idN>] 下载特定的提交。要求提供提交ID作为单独的参数。

trans-unit.source: tags alphabetically sorted tags (keywords)
trans-unit.target: tags 按字母顺序排序的标签（关键字）

trans-unit.source: tags comma-separated tags
trans-unit.target: tags 逗号分隔的标签

trans-unit.source: update [<user1>,...,<userN>] [<folder1>,...,<folderN>] update the repository by checking the previously downloaded folders (gallery, scraps, favorites or journals) of each user and stopping when it finds a submission that is already present in the repository. Can pass a list of users and/or folders that will be updated if in the database. To skip users, use -- as argument.
trans-unit.target: update [<user1>,...,<userN>] [<folder1>,...,<folderN>] 通过检查每个用户的先前下载的文件夹（图库，剪贴簿，收藏夹或日记）并停止来更新存储库当它找到存储库中已经存在的提交时。可以传递将在数据库中更新的用户和/或文件夹的列表。要跳过用户，请使用 -- 作为参数。

trans-unit.source: users <user1>,...,<userN> <folder1>,...,<folderN> download specific user folders. Requires two arguments with comma separated users and folders.
trans-unit.target: users <user1>,...,<userN> <folder1>,...,<folderN> 文件夹1 >，...，<文件夹N>下载特定的用户文件夹。需要两个参数，用逗号分隔用户和文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Note: Versions before 2.7.0 are not supported by falocalrepo version 3.0.0 and above. To update from those to the new version use version 2.11.2 to update the database to version 2.7.0
trans-unit.target: 注意： falocalrepo 3.0.0及更高版本不支持2.7.0之前的版本。要从那些更新到新版本，请使用版本2.11.2将数据库更新到版本2.7.0。

trans-unit.source: Note: all the commands with the exception of help will create and initialise the database if it is not present in the folder
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果文件夹中不存在数据库，则除 help 外的所有命令都将创建并初始化数据库

trans-unit.source: Warning: FurAffinity theme needs to be set to "beta"
trans-unit.target: 警告：FurAffinity主题需要设置为“ beta”

trans-unit.source: Add JOURNALS table and JOURNALS field in USERS table.
trans-unit.target: 在 USERS 表中添加“ JOURNALS 表和“ JOURNALS 字段。

trans-unit.source: Al contributions and suggestions are welcome!
trans-unit.target: 欢迎大家踊跃投稿,提出建议

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the storage inspection tool of a desktop browser can also be used. For example on Mozilla's Firefox this can be opened with the ⇧F9 shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 另外,也可以使用桌面浏览器的存储检查工具。例如,在Mozilla的Firefox上,可以用⇧F9快捷键打开这个工具。

trans-unit.source: Appendix
trans-unit.target: 附录

trans-unit.source: As of 2020-08-09 these take the form of hexadecimal strings like 356f5962-5a60-0922-1c11-65003b703038.
Available commands are:
trans-unit.target: 可用的命令有:

trans-unit.source: Available operations are:
trans-unit.target: 可用的业务有:

trans-unit.source: Available options are:
trans-unit.target: 可用的选项有:

trans-unit.source: Available settings are:
trans-unit.target: 可用的设置有:

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.source: Contents
trans-unit.target: 内容

trans-unit.source: Contributing
trans-unit.target: 贡献

trans-unit.source: Cookies
trans-unit.target: 饼干

trans-unit.source: Cookies need to be set manually with the config command before the program will be able to access protected pages.
trans-unit.target: 在程序能够访问受保护的页面之前,需要用config命令手动设置Cookies。

trans-unit.source: Database
trans-unit.target: 数据库

trans-unit.source: Download
trans-unit.target: 下载中心

trans-unit.source: Each entry contains the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 每个条目包含以下字段:

trans-unit.source: Earlier Releases
trans-unit.target: 早期版本

trans-unit.source: FALocalRepo
trans-unit.target: FALocalRepo

trans-unit.source: Files are moved to the new structure and the old files folder is deleted. Only submissions files are kept starting from version 3.0.0
trans-unit.target: 文件被移动到新的结构,旧的文件夹被删除。从3.0.0版本开始只保留提交文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a submission 1457893 will be padded to 0001457893 and divided into 00, 01, 45, 78, 93. The submission file will then be saved as 00/01/45/78/93/submission.file with the correct extension extracted from the file itself - FurAffinity links do not always contain the right extension and often confuse jpg and png -.
trans-unit.target: 例如，提交 1457893 将被填充到 0001457893 ，并分成 00 ， 01 ， 45 ， 78 ， 93 。然后，提交文件将保存为00/01/45/78/93 00/01/45/78/93/submission.file ，并从文件本身中提取了正确的扩展名-FurAffinity链接并不总是包含正确的扩展名，并且经常混淆jpg和png-。

trans-unit.source: Generally, commands need to be in the following format:
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,命令需要采用以下格式。

trans-unit.source: Help
trans-unit.target: 帮忙

trans-unit.source: How to Read Usage Instructions
trans-unit.target: 如何阅读使用说明

trans-unit.source: If any problem is encountered during usage of the program, an issue can be opened on the project's pages on GitLab (preferred) or GitHub (mirror repository).
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用程序期间遇到任何问题，可以在GitLab（首选）或GitHub（镜像存储库）上的项目页面上打开问题。

trans-unit.source: If you have suggestions for fixes or improvements, you can open an issue with your idea, see #Issues for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有修复或改进的建议，则可以提出您的想法的问题，有关详细信息，请参见＃问题。

trans-unit.source: Information from the database are copied over to the new version, but otherwise remain unaltered save for a few changed column names in the SUBMISSIONS and USERS tables.
trans-unit.target: 来自数据库的信息被复制到新版本中，但除非在 SUBMISSIONS 和 USERS 表中更改了一些列名，否则它们将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Init
trans-unit.target: 启动

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Installation & Requirements
trans-unit.target: 安装与要求

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介紹

trans-unit.source: Issues
trans-unit.target: 问题

trans-unit.source: Issues can also be used to suggest improvements and features.
trans-unit.target: 问题也可以用来建议改进和功能。

trans-unit.source: It can be used to create the database and then manually edit it, or to update it to a new version without calling other commands.
trans-unit.target: 它可以用来创建数据库,然后手动编辑它,或者在不调用其他命令的情况下更新到新版本。

trans-unit.source: Journals
trans-unit.target: 期刊

trans-unit.source: Pure Python program to download any user's gallery/scraps/favorites and more from FurAffinity forum in an easily handled database.
trans-unit.target: 纯粹的Python程序,用于下载FurAffinity论坛中任何用户的图库/碎片/收藏等等,并将其放入一个易于处理的数据库中。

trans-unit.source: Pure Python program to download any user's gallery/scraps/favorites from the FurAffinity forum in an easily handled database.
trans-unit.target: 纯粹的Python程序,用于从FurAffinity论坛下载任何用户的图库/碎片/收藏,并保存在一个易于处理的数据库中。

trans-unit.source: Python 3.8 or above is needed to run this program, all other dependencies are handled by pip during installation. For information on how to install Python on your computer, refer to the official website Python.org.
trans-unit.target: 运行该程序需要Python 3.8或更高版本，所有其他依赖项在安装过程中均由pip处理。有关如何在计算机上安装Python的信息，请访问官方网站Python.org。

trans-unit.source: Release 3.0.0 was deleted from PyPi because of an error in the package information. However, it can still be found in the code repository under tag v3.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 由于软件包信息中的错误，已从PyPi中删除了3.0.0版。但是，仍可以在代码存储库中的标签v3.0.0下找到它。

trans-unit.source: Release binaries before and including 2.10.2 can be found on GitHub -> Releases.
trans-unit.target: 可以在GitHub-> Releases上找到2.10.2之前和包含的发行版二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Release binaries for versions 2.11.x can be found on GitLab under tags -> FALocalRepo/tags 2.11
trans-unit.target: 可以在GitLab的标签-> FALocalRepo / tags 2.11下找到版本2.11.x的发行版二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Running the command alone will show the current values of the settings stored in the database. Running config <setting> without value arguments will show the current value of that specific setting.
trans-unit.target: 单独运行该命令将显示数据库中存储的设置的当前值。在没有值参数的情况下运行 config <setting> 将显示该特定设置的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Running without arguments will prompt a help message with all the available options and commands.
trans-unit.target: 在没有参数的情况下运行,会提示一个帮助信息,包括所有可用的选项和命令。

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: 设置

trans-unit.source: Submission Files
trans-unit.target: 提交文件

trans-unit.source: Submission files are saved in a tiered tree structure based on their submission ID. ID's are zero-padded to 10 digits and then broken up in 5 segments of 2 digits; each of this segments represents a folder tha will be created in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 提交的文件根据其提交ID保存在一个分层的树形结构中。ID的零填充为10位数,然后分成5个2位数的片段;每个片段代表一个文件夹,将在树上创建。

trans-unit.source: Submissions
trans-unit.target: 提交的材料

trans-unit.source: The config command allows to change the settings used by the program.
trans-unit.target: 的 config 命令允许改变由程序使用的设置。

trans-unit.source: The database command allows to operate on the database. Used without an operation command shows the database statistics (number of users and submissions and time of last update) and version.
trans-unit.target: 该 database 命令允许对数据库进行操作。在不使用操作命令的情况下使用将显示数据库统计信息（用户数和提交数以及上次更新时间）和版本。

trans-unit.source: The download command performs all download and repository update operations.
trans-unit.target: 该 download 命令执行所有下载和存储库更新操作。

trans-unit.source: The help command gives information on the usage of the program and its commands. Run alone for help on the whole program and with a single argument to get help for a specific command.
trans-unit.target: 该 help 命令提供了有关程序和命令的使用信息。单独运行以获取整个程序的帮助，并使用单个参数来获取特定命令的帮助。

trans-unit.source: The init command initialises the database or, if one is already present, updates to a new version - if available - and then exits.
trans-unit.target: 在 init 命令初始化数据库，或者，如果已经存在，更新到新版本-如果有的话-再退出。

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to obtain these cookies is by using a browser extension to extract your cookies and then search for a and b.
trans-unit.target: 获取这些cookie的最简单方法是使用浏览器扩展程序提取您的cookie，然后搜索 a 和 b 。

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are optional:
trans-unit.target: 以下参数是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The journals table contains the metadata of the journals downloaded by the program.
trans-unit.target: 期刊表包含程序下载的期刊的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The only requirement is that any merge request must be sent to the GitLab project as the one on GitHub is only a mirror: GitLab/FALocalRepo
trans-unit.target: 唯一的要求是，任何合并请求都必须发送到GitLab项目，因为GitHub上的请求只是一个镜像：GitLab / FALocalRepo

trans-unit.source: The program needs cookies from a logged-in FurAffinity session to download protected pages. Without the cookies the program can still download publicly available pages, but others will return empty. See #Cookies for more details on which cookies to use.
trans-unit.target: 该程序需要登录的FurAffinity会话中的cookie才能下载受保护的页面。没有Cookie，该程序仍可以下载公共可用页面，但其他页面将返回空白。有关使用哪些Cookie的更多详细信息，请参见#Cookies。

trans-unit.source: The scraping library used by this program needs two specific cookies from a logged-in FurAffinity session. These are cookie a and cookie b.
trans-unit.target: 该程序使用的抓取库需要从登录的FurAffinity会话中获取两个特定的cookie。它们是cookie a 和cookie b 。

trans-unit.source: The settings table contains settings for the program and statistics of the database.
trans-unit.target: 设置表包含程序的设置和数据库的统计。

trans-unit.source: The submissions table contains the metadata of the submissions downloaded by the program and information on their files
trans-unit.target: 提交表包含程序下载的提交文件的元数据及其文件信息。

trans-unit.source: The users table contains a list of all the users that have been download with the program, the folders that have been downloaded and the submissions found in each of those.
trans-unit.target: 用户表包含了所有已下载程序的用户、已下载的文件夹以及在每个文件夹中发现的提交内容。

trans-unit.source: This program uses a custom scraping library to get content from FurAffinity. This is developed as a separate package also available on PyPi and GitLab. The data thus collected is then stored into a SQLite3 database and the submissions files are saved in a tiered tree structure based on their ID's.
trans-unit.target: 该程序使用自定义的抓取库从FurAffinity获取内容。这是作为单独的软件包开发的，也可以在PyPi和GitLab上获得。然后将由此收集的数据存储到SQLite3数据库中，并将提交文件根据其ID保存在分层树结构中。

trans-unit.source: This program was born with the desire to provide a relatively easy-to-use method for FA users to download submissions that they care about from the forum.
trans-unit.target: 这个程序的诞生,是希望为FA用户提供一个相对简单易用的方法,让他们从论坛上下载自己关心的投稿。

trans-unit.source: To install the program it is sufficient to use Python pip and get the package falocalrepo.
trans-unit.target: 要安装该程序，使用Python pip并获取软件包 falocalrepo 就足够了。

trans-unit.source: To run the program, simply call falocalrepo in your shell after installation.
trans-unit.target: 要运行该程序，只需在安装后在外壳中调用 falocalrepo 。

trans-unit.source: To set the cookies use the config cookies command. See #Configuration for more details.
trans-unit.target: 要设置cookie，请使用 config cookies 命令。有关更多详细信息，请参见#Configuration。

trans-unit.source: To store all this information, the database uses three tables: SETTINGS, USERS and SUBMISSIONS.
trans-unit.target: 为了存储所有这些信息，数据库使用三个表： SETTINGS ， USERS 和 SUBMISSIONS 。

trans-unit.source: To store the metadata of the downloaded submissions, journals, users, cookies and statistics, the program uses a SQLite3 database. This database is built to be as light as possible while also containing all the metadata that can be extracted from a submission page.
trans-unit.target: 为了存储下载的投稿、期刊、用户、cookies和统计数据的元数据,该程序使用了一个SQLite3数据库。这个数据库的建立是为了尽可能的轻巧,同时也包含所有可以从提交页面中提取的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Upgrading Database
trans-unit.target: 升级数据库

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Users
trans-unit.target: 用户

trans-unit.source: When opening an issue for a problem, please copy the error message and describe the operation in progress when the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 开设问题时,请复制错误信息,并描述错误发生时正在进行的操作。

trans-unit.source: When the database is first initialised, it defaults the submissions files folder to FA.files. This value can be changed using the config command.
trans-unit.target: 首次初始化数据库时，它将提交文件文件夹默认为 FA.files 。可以使用 config 命令更改此值。

trans-unit.source: When the program starts, it checks the version of the database against the one used by the program and if the latter is more advanced it updates the database.
trans-unit.target: 当程序启动时,它会检查数据库的版本和程序使用的版本,如果后者更先进,就会更新数据库。
